effect.short: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
effect.full: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises
the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with
the Plus or Minus Ability.
